creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: moss-covered rock at LR with shoots of chrysanthemum leaves, and several clusters of white chrysanthemums; a few brambles within the grouping; inscription URQ
inscription:
Inscription and Seals

URC, in Japanese
markings: URC, oval relief; top center, top stamp, square intaglio; top center, lower stamp, square relief; LLC, square intaglio
title: Chrysanthemum and Peony (Chrysanthemum; one of a pair)
